lines.text: [hearing a dinosaur roar]
What is it, Doc?
It can only be one thing. Prehistoric!
[they hear another roar]
Definitely prehistoric.
[they hear a woman's scream]
That's human.
[attempting to repair the damaged plane]
God damn it! When I put you together you stay together!
[he accidentally puts his foot through the wing]
Oh, no...
[Hogan is going insane and talking to his own reflection]
Hogan? Yeah? If I don't get outta here you're gonna go bananas!
[first lines]
Okay, hold it.
[Charly takes a picture of the Amphib's crew]
Is it all right if we get back to work now?
Thanks awfully. Sorry to be such a bore.
Not at all, Lady Charlotte. It's rather fun.
Ahem. Mr. Graham.
Once we get to that Amphib, we're home and dry.
The land'll stop you, Ben. It's alive. That volcano's its heart. It controls everything.
How can the land be alive?
Ask Ajor if we can get out of here.
[Adjor nods her head no]
[last lines]
You know, my uncle will have a heart attack when we get back empty-handed. In fact, he'll probably fire me.
Maybe you weren't meant to make your name in pictures.
Got any other ideas?
Oh, I'll think of something. Charly?
Yes?
Why didn't you tell me about that gun you had stashed in your camera case?
I was keeping it in case we got into a jam.
